title: USA luge buddies and volunteers from Afghanistan at Lausanne 2020
description: USA men's luge doubles team, Sam Day and Sam Eckert, talk about their big ambitions for their career. Plus, two Afghan volunteers who are living in Lausanne tell their incredible stories. Plus, a last question with some of the British curling team.
itunes:title: USA luge buddies and volunteers from Afghanistan at Lausanne 2020
itunes:summary: USA men's luge doubles team, Sam Day and Sam Eckert, talk about their big ambitions for their career. Plus, two Afghan volunteers who are living in Lausanne tell their incredible stories. Plus, a last question with some of the British curling team.
